comment: Rinku is such an inspiration for the whole class. The way he tackled all the hurdles that came his way and overcame all the challenges is praiseworthy. Best of luck for your future, keep shining.
name: Nishi Thakur

comment: Rinku, you've shown me that with determination, anything is possible. I'm incredibly proud of how far you've come through your hard work. Keep pushing your boundaries, and I'm confident you'll achieve your dreams one day. All the best!!!!!!!😊
name: Ishita Agrawal

comment: You are really an inspiration for everyone. From struggling to understand mathematics in 1st semester to getting highest marks in final semester displays how much hard work you have done. Keep it up brother. Best wishes for your future.
name: Akash Bhople

comment: Sop sorry disturbing you everytime u were studying. I am so so proud of you for the way you grew here. Khayla rakhna apna. All the best for your future.
name: Shubham

comment: Hello mere Rajasthani friend Rinku!!!!! You are awesome bro, care about your studies as well as health. I am grateful to have you in my life at IIT. Meri ek advise hai bhai ki thoda sa jayada bolna start kr de, vrna log tere Rajasthani hone pr doubt krenge 😂. Best wishes for your upcoming journey👍
name: Sanjay Kumar Yadav
